# Cocomoco



## Installation

Simple install this module via pip (pip for Python 2 is also supported)

```
pip3 install --user cocomoco
```

## Usage

### As Python Module

```
import cocomoco

result = cocomoco.calculate(100000')
print(result)
```

### As Python Executable

```sh
$ python3 -m cocomoco --sloc <number> [--model <modelname>]
```
